players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Keep an eye on Alice, she seems suspicious."
You: "I am innocent and I have nothing to hide. I will keep an eye on Bob, he's the one who killed Diana."
Charlie: "I think Bob is the Mafioso, he killed Diana last night and now he's trying to frame Alice. We should lynch him."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
